metadata.Title: CVE-2022-41859 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In freeradius, the EAP-PWD function compute_password_element() leaks information about the password which allows an attacker to substantially reduce the size of an offline dictionary attack.

notes.Note: 0xnishit> This issue affects bionic and focal releases, but the changes requires major code changes and backporting.

criterions.comment: freeradius: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
